item.description:
A Day At The Museum - Wadsworth Atheneum
Okay, we have been to the Wadsworth many times. Usually for the more social events with music and other exciting happenings. Many times we are not really exploring the art work throughout, this is the day to explore their wonderful collection!! Lets enjoy the collection together and then maybe grab a bite, not sure of the status of the Museum Cafe, it is temporarily closed, but there are other options close by.


Wadsworth has free admission on last Saturdays 10:00 - 1:00!!!

Parking is free on the street on the weekends.
also The Morgan Street Garage is $4.00 all day Saturday. located at the corner of Market and Talcott Streets.
Prospect turns into Market Street if you go right off 91 exit.
item.how_to_find_us: meet in the lobby at 10:45 Will wear the BW scarf with piano keys
item.name: A day at the Museum!!!
